{"id":420898719,"lang":"javascript","lang_name":"JavaScript","time":"2 years, 7 months","timestamp":1605538530,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"84 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/420898719/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"39.2 MB","code":"/**\n * @param {number} x\n * @param {number} n\n * @return {number}\n */\nvar myPow = function(x, n) {\n   \n    if (n < 0 && x !== 0) {\n        return myPow(1/x, n*-1)\n    }\n    \n    if (n == 0) {\n        return 1;\n    }\n    \n    if(n == 1){\n        return x\n    }\n    \n    if (n % 2 == 0) {\n        var res = myPow(x, n/2);\n        return res * res;\n    }\n    else\n    {\n        return myPow(x, n - 1) * x\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false}
